sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Pfizer ( PFE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.3%.
Year to date, Pfizer registers a 8.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Cisco Systems ( CSCO ), trading down 2.0%.
Cisco Systems is showing a gain of 12.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.7%, and Merck & Co. ( MRK ), trading up 0.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
